short_summary: Generating and charging plant for aircraft.
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSAL FOR PROCUREMENT of generating and charging plant oxygène and azote.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Award Title: Generating and Charging Plant, Oxygen-Nitrogen, Skid Mounted

#### Contract Details
- **Contract Reference No.**: cb-441-81450938
- **Solicitation No.**: W8485-258521/A
- **Publication Date**: 2024-11-20
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-12-20T14:00:00

#### Notice Details
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Goods and Services
- **UNSPSC Code**: 25202607
- **UNSPSC Description**: Aircraft Oxygen Equipment
- **Delivery Location**: Canada
- **Expected Delivery Date**: 2025-03-31

#### Trade Agreement
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada is open to bids from suppliers from the following countries:
  - Chile
  - Colombia
  - Honduras
  - Korea
  - Panama
  - Peru
  - United Kingdom
  - European Union

#### Contracting Entity
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
- **Contact Person**: Dany Lebel
- **Email**: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
- **Phone**: (000) 000-0000

- **Tender Documents**:

#### Important Notes
- Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, it is strongly recommended to submit bids electronically through the epost Connect service.
- The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

In repurposing the text, the key changes were made to the format, emphasis, and sentence structure to make the announcement more professional and easier to read. The format has been changed to follow the standard Government of Canada tender announcement guidelines. Emphasis was placed on making the most relevant and important details easily accessible to the readers. Sentence structure and length have also been modified to improve clarity and readability. In addition, proper parenthetical cues have been added to ensure correct formatting within this markdown document.  
The result is now a more concisely written, clear, and concise document that is easier to scan and digest, ideal for business professionals and contractors alike.
